statements: SELECT protocol_name, encryption_type FROM WirelessConfigurations;
SELECT max_bandwidth, encryption_type FROM WirelessConfigurations;
SELECT frequency_range FROM WirelessConfigurations WHERE max_bandwidth > 100;
SELECT * FROM WirelessConfigurations WHERE encryption_type='WPA2';
SELECT protocol_name, frequency_range FROM WirelessConfigurations ORDER BY max_bandwidth DESC;
SELECT * FROM WirelessConfigurations WHERE encryption_type='WPA2'
SELECT protocol_name, frequency_range FROM WirelessConfigurations WHERE max_bandwidth > 100
SELECT * FROM WirelessConfigurations WHERE frequency_range IN ('2.4 GHz', '5 GHz') ORDER BY max_bandwidth DESC
SELECT DISTINCT encryption_type FROM WirelessConfigurations
SELECT protocol_name, frequency_range, max_bandwidth FROM WirelessConfigurations WHERE protocol_name='802.11ac'
SELECT * FROM WirelessProtocols;
SELECT protocol_name, frequency FROM WirelessProtocols WHERE frequency > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT protocol_name FROM WirelessProtocols ORDER BY protocol_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168%';
SELECT protocol_id, protocol_name FROM WirelessProtocols WHERE bandwidth IS NULL;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices
SELECT * FROM WirelessProtocols WHERE frequency > 2.4
SELECT device_name, protocol_name FROM NetworkDevices INNER JOIN WirelessProtocols ON NetworkDevices.protocol_id = WirelessProtocols.protocol_id
SELECT protocol_name, frequency, bandwidth FROM WirelessProtocols ORDER BY frequency DESC
SELECT device_name, protocol_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices INNER JOIN WirelessProtocols ON NetworkDevices.protocol_id = WirelessProtocols.protocol_id WHERE frequency < 5
SELECT * FROM wifi_networks
SELECT ssid, encryption_type FROM wifi_networks WHERE channel = 6
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wifi_networks
SELECT ssid, password FROM wifi_networks WHERE encryption_type = 'WPA2'
SELECT MAX(battery_level) FROM zigbee_devices
SELECT * FROM wifi_networks WHERE encryption_type = 'WPA2'
SELECT ssid, channel FROM wifi_networks ORDER BY channel ASC
SELECT * FROM zigbee_devices WHERE battery_level > 50
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM bluetooth_devices WHERE is_connected = TRUE
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM bluetooth_devices WHERE device_type = 'speaker'
SELECT * FROM wifi_networks;
SELECT ssid, password FROM wifi_networks WHERE network_id = 1;
SELECT device_name FROM bluetooth_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, endpoint FROM zigbee_devices WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT device_id, frequency_band FROM lora_devices WHERE frequency_band = '868 MHz';
SELECT * FROM wifi_networks WHERE network_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, pairing_code FROM bluetooth_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name FROM zigbee_devices WHERE endpoint = 2;
SELECT * FROM lora_devices WHERE frequency_band = 'Sub-GHz';
SELECT network_id, ssid FROM wifi_networks WHERE ssid LIKE '%office%' AND password = 'securepassword';
SELECT * FROM wifi_networks ORDER BY ssid DESC;
SELECT network_id, password FROM bluetooth_devices WHERE paired = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM zigbee_networks WHERE coordinator_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM lora_devices LIMIT 5;
SELECT network_id, bandwidth FROM 5g_networks WHERE encryption_algorithm = 'WPA3';
SELECT * FROM wifi_networks WHERE network_id = 1
SELECT ssid, password FROM wifi_networks WHERE security_protocol = 'WPA2'
SELECT * FROM bluetooth_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM zigbee_networks WHERE channel_number = 11
SELECT provider, encryption_algorithm FROM 5g_networks
